name: Logan Cottage B&B

reviews.text: we very much enjoyed our lovely stay here. Cottage is immaculately decorated and clean, so pretty with a true cottage feel. Only two rooms for guests and we stayed with friends so had the place just for us four. Each room has own bathroom, also there is a lounge area with a big TV and dvd player. The landlady was extremely friendly and helpful, best breakfast we had on our two month long holiday!
reviews.title: Absolutely darling

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Nancy Logan's Cottage is just delightful....great bed, attractive bath, nice guest lounge and a 5 minute walk from downtown. We are light breakfast eaters, but one full breakfast was a lovely treat.
reviews.title: What a nice place !
Warm welcome
reviews.text: We were made very welcome for our short stay. The owner was very helpful and attentive though unobtrusive.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband, my mother and I recently returned from a 16-day trip to Scotland where we stayed in B & B's. We stayed at Logan Cottage in Inverness and it was absolutely wonderful. The accommodations were outstanding and Nancy was great!
reviews.title: Absolutely the Best B&B Ever!

reviews.text: The B & B is rated a 4 star but it was, by far, the best B & B any of us have ever stayed in. My husband and I have toured Ireland and Wales as well as a variety of places in Europe, staying primarily in B & B's so we have extensive experience with European B & B's and can only reiterate that Logan Cottage was the best. In fact, we do not understand why Logan Cottage is not a 5 star B & B.
reviews.title: Lovely Logan Cottage
Best of All
reviews.text: My mother, sister, daughter and I stayed two nights at Logan Cottage, in the middle of an 8-day stay. Logan Cottage was by far our favorite accomodation. We enjoyed it even more than Dalhousie Castle!

Logan Cottage was the best accommodation that my new husband and I stayed in during our visit to Scotland recently. Nancy is a most welcoming hostess and it truly was a home away from home. From the beautiful bathroom, complete with a large tub and candles, the monogrammed bathrobes, the decanter of Scottish cheer and the made to order Scottish breakfast, I only wished that I could stay longer. Any trip to Inverness must include a stay at Logan Cottage
reviews.title: Home Away From Home

reviews.text: Logan Cottage is the perfect place to stay in Inverness. It's on a quiet little street, just a short walk from downtown. Nancy is an absolute joy to chat with. She really means to make your stay pleasant, down to the little details. She even leaves some scotch on the dresser for her guests. The breakfast was delicious--even got to choose what we wanted. The only thing to remember is that phones are not available for guest use. There is a payphone around the corner from the cottage. Only wish we got to stay more than one night. Would definitely stay there again!
reviews.title: A Perfect Night!
an absolute dream come true
reviews.text: We just returned from a wonderful, magical trip in The Highlands of Scotland. Our home base was Logan Cottage in Inverness. I booked it after reading previous reviews here on tripadvisor.com. I admit I had my hopes up pretty high and yet all my expectations were exceeded. Logan Cottage is idyllic. Nancy Logan is warm, charming, knowledgable and friendly. We had the cottage to ourselves (4 of us) and it worked out perfectly. Everything is sparkling clean, comfortable and cozy and tastefully decorated. The food is excellent (Nancy's husband Richard is the cook and handyman) and Nancy is always there to help with any questions. We had lots of privacy and we enjoyed the beautiful backyard garden as well.

description: Logan Cottage is a 4* Bed&Breakfast in Inverness, we offer a high standard of accommadition and service and a home from home welcome to our guests. We have 2 double en-suite rooms and 1 twin/superking room with a large private bathroom. All rooms have Hospitality tray t.v /d.v.d and large selection of d.v.d's robes hairdryers and much more. Price includes full scottish breakfast.
